description: In a barren desert landscape featuring a tall cactus, a man lies on the ground covered by a blanket, a scorpion perched precariously on his forehead. Another man stands over him, holding a large rock aloft with both hands, seemingly preparing to use it. The situation presents dark irony, as the attempt to remove a small, dangerous creature involves a method that would likely inflict significant harm on the person. The command to remain motionless while facing such a threat and intervention highlights the absurd and perilous nature of the moment.
caption: “Hold still, Carl! … Don’t … move … an … inch!”
